      public boolean withinRange​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 attackFrom, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 testPoint, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 attackDirection)
      Method for determining whether an entity is within range of the weapon
      Parameters:
      attackFrom - The vector that the attack is coming from
      testPoint - A vector to test from
      attackDirection - A vector representing the direction that the attack is going to.
      Returns:
      Boolean representing whether the attack is in range or not
